document.full_text: palestinian president mahmoud abbas's fatah group inked a deal on wednesday with bitter rival hamas to end their long-running feud and form an interim government ahead of elections within a year.
document.title: fatah, hamas end feud, agree to interim government
lines_and_colors: palestinian president mahmoud abbas's fatah group inked a deal on wednesday with bitter rival hamas to end their long-running feud and form an interim government ahead of elections within a year.
